title: TT ranked shitty matchmaking
body:
What's with the shitty matchmaking in TT ranked???? I'm bronze 5 AF and get placed against a team of 2 platinums and a silver... with a full bronze team, 3 times in a row. Fuck that off, how is that supposed to be fun for anyone?

Please unbreak matchmaking

replies.body:
The ranking (MMR) system is different between ques:

* Summoners Rift - Normal blind pick
* Summoners Rift - Ranked Solo/Duo Draft pick
* Summoners Rift - Ranked Flex Draft pick
* Howling Abyss - ARAM Normal All Random
* Twisted Treeline - Ranked Draft Pick

And you can have a different rank for each que. For example: 

In SR - Normal blind pick I could be diamond MMR (I say Diamond because, I pre-made with challengers and diamonds and they carried me a lot)
Whilst in SR - Ranked Solo/duo I'm Silver 1
and in SR - Ranked flex I'm Bronze 4 (cause i used this to group with my bronze friends thankyou riot)

So whilst Twisted Treeline - Ranked Draft pick is complete 'shitty matchmaking' mixing you with bronze teams against diamonds it's because, the MMR isn't set in TT - Ranked. So it's going to be garbage for about a week or two. Whilst it sets Summoners where they should be at. Based on their performance. SO expect shit Match making for a week or 2.

> expect shit Match making for a week or 2.

I'd say probably expect sh!tty matchmaking for a bit longer, probably a month *at least*, given the queue is (currently) only available for 10 hours once a week. It will take heaps of games for people to start getting where they should be, even after the high ELO players get to their respective ranks.
It's probs based of normal TT mmr, but I agree that 2 weeks is a bit generous.

Mate their solo queue rank means nothing in TT ranked. 

Fuck i wish people would use their brains before crying about this same "issue" time and time again...

Oh, i guess you are right, it makes total sense that someone who is platinum in summoner's rift would be bronze 5 in tt, it's not like the mechanics are EXACTLY the same, and the game knowledge is almost the same, nah.
what do expect when fuckall people would be queing for it. do you want to wait a millions years.
